original_text: My Christian friends, please listen patiently to my message. This is only a short letter and I want to help you to be strong.
korean_text: 형제들아 내가 너희를 권하노니 권면의 말을 용납하라 내가 간단히 너희에게 썼느니라

sentences.original_text: please listen patiently to my message
This is only a short letter
and I want to help you to be strong
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 여러분이 강해지도록 돕고 싶습니다
